interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Somaluxe Collagen Moisturizer with 3 Types of Collagen Peptides and Hyaluronic Acid, 2 oz
Review Date: 2020/04/15
Store: Somaluxe
Product Description: ["Indulge your skin with the perfect daily hydrating moisturizer that not only quenches your skin's thirst but also nourishes it with an array of enriching benefits. This specially formulated moisturizer features a proprietary vitamin complex that works wonders to boost collagen production, resulting in visibly smoother and younger-looking skin. Say goodbye to pesky fine lines and wrinkles as this moisturizer helps to minimize their appearance, leaving you with a flawless complexion that radiates confidence. The secret to this moisturizer's amazing effectiveness lies in its blend of natural ingredients, including coconut extract, which provides superior moisture retention to combat dryness and give your skin a youthfully smooth texture. But that's not all – this moisturizer is also infused with the goodness of shea butter, avocado, sunflower, and olive fruit oils that work in harmony to condition your skin and restore its suppleness. These nourishing oils penetrate deep into the skin to support its natural protective barrier, shielding it from harmful environmental stressors and pollutants. With this daily hydrating moisturizer, you can expect a host of benefits that go beyond mere hydration. Get ready to enjoy a more youthful, radiant, and healthy-looking complexion that's the envy of all. So go ahead, pamper your skin with the luxurious care it deserves and say hello to a healthier, happier you!"]
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '639713237146', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: The cream is fairly thin, with a pudding like consistency. Applies and spreads well. Leave a hydrated feel without an oily or shiny residual. Happy with it's performance, just not crazy about the scent. Smells earthy, like peat moss.
Review Title: Thin but works well. Not crazy about the scent.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
MARLOWE. Essentials Kit for Men No. 202 | Gift Set with 9 Products, Toiletry Bag | Lotion, Shave, Wash, Soap, Pomade, Lip Balm | Simple & Effective MARLOWE. M BLEND {'Package Dimensions': '10.24 x 5.24 x 4.76 inches; 2.62 Pounds', 'UPC': '859984007822'} I am a fan of MARLOW products...I have several others not included in this set and all are great. I'll break down each product briefly below.

BAG: Very nice, basic black but well padded and holds it's shape. I basic in shape but I higher quality then usual.

SOAP: Great balsam/fir scent. Excellent balance of exfoliation and suds. Leaves body invigorated, soft and smelling great!

SHAVE: Has a tea scent, hint of some sort of alcohol. Builds into a creamy texture, not much sud but decent coverage. Does it's job. Finishes with a clean scent.

FACE WASH: Nice balsam/fir scent to it. A little goes a long way! Very slick, seems to not penetrate but wash the exterior of skin. Takes some work to wash off. Finishes with a green tea scent and refreshed.

FACE MOISTURIZER: Has a tea/alcohol scent at first...Goes on smooth. Dries fairly quickly, leaving a sweet green tea scent. Leaves face feeling soft not oily.

POMADE: Great scent, more cologne like. Goes on easy, not too tacky or slick. Does a decent job.

LIP BALM: Awesome balm!!! At first I thought it was an odd addition to the set. But man I love this balm. Goes on with a hint of sweet tea. Not waxy, not glossy, just a perfect balance that keeps lips moisturized. Great set...All you need in one bundle. Great gift for someone. AZURE Hyaluronic & Retinol Anti Aging Under Eye Pads- Moisturizing & Rejuvenating Eye Mask Patches - Reduces Fine Lines, Wrinkles, Dark Circles & Puffiness - Skin Care Made in Korea - 5 Pairs Azure Cosmetics {'Brand': 'Azure Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Under eye Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 1 x 6 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '689513260202', 'UPC': '689513260202', 'Manufacturer': 'Just Solutions!'} Pretty straight forward. Come 2 to a sealed pouch. They are stacked in the pouch so they can be a little difficult to get apart and straightened out. No noticeable or standout scent to them. Apply smooth, nice that they have slits so you can shape it to your contour. They do a nice job refreshing and smoothing my eyes. Nice product. Smooths nicely. Somaluxe Collagen Moisturizer with 3 Types of Collagen Peptides and Hyaluronic Acid, 2 oz Somaluxe ["Indulge your skin with the perfect daily hydrating moisturizer that not only quenches your skin's thirst but also nourishes it with an array of enriching benefits. This specially formulated moisturizer features a proprietary vitamin complex that works wonders to boost collagen production, resulting in visibly smoother and younger-looking skin. Say goodbye to pesky fine lines and wrinkles as this moisturizer helps to minimize their appearance, leaving you with a flawless complexion that radiates confidence. The secret to this moisturizer's amazing effectiveness lies in its blend of natural ingredients, including coconut extract, which provides superior moisture retention to combat dryness and give your skin a youthfully smooth texture. But that's not all – this moisturizer is also infused with the goodness of shea butter, avocado, sunflower, and olive fruit oils that work in harmony to condition your skin and restore its suppleness. These nourishing oils penetrate deep into the skin to support its natural protective barrier, shielding it from harmful environmental stressors and pollutants. With this daily hydrating moisturizer, you can expect a host of benefits that go beyond mere hydration. Get ready to enjoy a more youthful, radiant, and healthy-looking complexion that's the envy of all. So go ahead, pamper your skin with the luxurious care it deserves and say hello to a healthier, happier you!"] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 2 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'UPC': '639713237146', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} The cream is fairly thin, with a pudding like consistency. Applies and spreads well. Leave a hydrated feel without an oily or shiny residual. Happy with it's performance, just not crazy about the scent. Smells earthy, like peat moss. Thin but works well. Not crazy about the scent.
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Brand Affinity**: Continues to prefer MARLOWE products but is also engaging with brands like Somaluxe, indicating a willingness to explore effective products that meet high standards.
- **Product Types**: Maintains an interest in comprehensive grooming kits and targeted skincare solutions, now prominently including moisturizers that focus on hydration and anti-aging benefits, reflecting an emphasis on specialized treatments.
- **Scent Preferences**: While natural, fresh scents remain favored, the recent experience with an earthy scent suggests an increasing flexibility towards functional benefits over fragrance preference.
- **Quality Expectations**: Expects high-quality products, valuing effective formulations that prioritize skin care. The ongoing focus remains on design and user experience for effective skincare solutions.
- **Experience Orientation**: Appreciates practical products and is now particularly interested in those that offer hydrating and rejuvenating properties, reinforcing the goal of achieving a healthier, youthful-looking complexion.
- **Gift-Giving**: Considers high-quality moisturizers and skincare items like eye masks as ideal gifts, underscoring a belief in their universal appeal and effectiveness in personal care.

Overall, the user showcases a trend towards effective and quality skincare solutions that blend practicality with targeted benefits, while remaining open to new options that align with their standards for functionality and aesthetics.
